sentences.sContent: I ordered the evacuation of all Americans and sent troops to guarantee their safety.
sentences.sContent_eng: I ordered the evacuation of all Americans and sent troops to guarantee their safety.
sentences.sCn: 我下令撤离所有的美国人，并派部队去保证他们的安全。

sentences.sContent: The impact of evacuation and relocation on those with health or functional impairments can be tremendous .
sentences.sContent_eng: The impact of evacuation and relocation on those with health or functional impairments can be tremendous .
sentences.sCn: 撤离和重新安置对这些健康状况欠佳或身体残疾的人影响极大。

phrases.pCn: 疏散时间，撤离时间；排气时间
避难方向；疏散路线；撤离路线

remMethod.val: e(出) + vacu(空的) + ation → 空出来 → 撤离

words.tran: 疏散；撤出；排泄（evacuate的过去式和过去分词形式）
